body_html:
The linked ci script might be overkill (?) for this. I would imagine this can be boiled down

  1. docker build gpu-devel
  2. docker run with volume to copy out the wheel
  3. docker build of the gpu image with the wheel in the build context

My initial hope was that with sufficient cleaning of the bazel cache, I could get by with just doing step 1 and having an imagine that was "small enough".
